website_summaries.verdict: A dedicated outdoor basketball that is the appropriate size for players working up to new levels of skill and control.
pros: The smaller size fits well into the hands of younger children (ages 5 to 8) to help develop a better feel and control over the ball at an early age
Will survive the abuse of outdoor play
cons: Basketball can run on the small side

customer_reviews.title: VERY nice ball. No product packaging, though.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition, and inflated to proper specs. Ready to use! Great ball all around, and looks good too. Was odd that it came in an unmarked, plain cardboard box. No brand, no words, no instructions, etc. Thus, this would not make a good "gift" since it might seem used to the receiver. There were no marks, smears, nor anything else on the ball to indicate it had been used, though, so not sure why it didn't have a product box.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Good ball for price, but not very giftable
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a decent although not great ball. It has stayed inflated since far but I've read many reviews saying it will not hold air and that has me worried. It did arrive with some scuff marks, which since I bought this to shoot around outside doesn't bother me but it also has no packaging. It is a ball in a box when it arrives. So, if you're looking for a gift, this one is NOT the most giftable.
customer_reviews.author: Garland R.

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Crap
customer_reviews.text: It arrived partially deflated, and the first time I went to inflate it, the little black inflator plug piece pushed into the basketball. Piece of Crap.
customer_reviews.author: Curlyconch

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Does not stay inflated!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worse ball ever! First of all, the ball came half deflated and my son was not even able to play with it right away. I was like "ok, I just need to buy a pump". I went ahead and purchased a pump the next day from a store near me (extra expenses). We inflated the ball before going to bed. The next morning, half of the air was gone. I shouldn't have been surprised as most of the did reviews I read before purchasing said the same thing. I was still hoping that my experience would be different but it was not, sadly!! DO NOT BUY. NOT WORTH A PENNY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Astuce

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware..& DONT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t get a response from the owner who sent me a flat ball with scuff marks all over it in a plain brown cardboard box. Then I was told that I had to drive 20 minutes out of my way to the nearest Amazon drop off in order to return it it’s not worth it to gas in my car alone cost what a basketball cost be where of fir then I was told that I had to drive 20 minutes out of my way to the nearest Amazon drop off in order to return it it’s not worth it to gas in my car alone cost what a basketball cost
customer_reviews.author: Johanna Kate Spector ratner

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, great price!
customer_reviews.text: These basketballs are just adorable! I bought 3 for sisters who all have a birthday near each other and a dad who is big into basketball. They just loved them! My only issue is that they came not all the way inflated and I didn't have a needle or the time to get one to fix that issue so I ended up having to give them semi flat balls and their dad aired them up after. They don't come in any particular packaging either just plain brown boxes which is nice for wrapping but not the best presentation. Just some things to be aware of. Overall a great value and product!
customer_reviews.author: Steffani

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking ball. Good grip. Right away, looked like it was going to be a nice purchase. Inflated it to the manufacturer spec of 8 psi. By next morning it had lost some air just sitting. Topped it off to 8 psi again and took it to the park so my nephew could shoot some hoops. Within 20 minutes had already lost air. By the next morning, it was almost flat. Very disappointed. Returned and got my money back. Never had an issue with Spalding before as they usually make quality sporting equipment. Maybe just got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No one will mistake it for theirs
customer_reviews.text: I was getting tired of our balls getting stolen so I opted for the bright yellow and green one. We put our names and phone number on the pilfered sports equipment but to no avail. I see many people saying the tread wears down after intense usage but I am not bothered by that. Absolutely no one mistakes it for theirs or can walk off with it when distracted teenagers are not paying attention; unless they stick in a bag or something.
customer_reviews.author: Manetta Du

customer_reviews.title: Quality check before you keep!
customer_reviews.text: This ball was purchased as a gift, so I was disappointed when I received it. There were scuff marks all over it, so clearly it had been used or something! Also there were some strange markings, like the imprint of tape on certain areas around the printed words and pieces of rubber That were peeling or extra. I bought a second ball, same style that did not have any of these same cosmetic issues. Not sure the issue but I’m returning and ordering a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Haleym4

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Good price, and it didn't develop a hole fast like my son's last basketball. My 11 yr old has had it for around 7 months - through the summer, at basketball camp, and now halfway through winter basketball season - and it's still holding up strong.
customer_reviews.author: DevotedMomWifeNurse

customer_reviews.title: Kid is happy
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves green and blue so this ball was a hit! It was a gift, so i was expecting it to be incased in a cardboard box... but when I opened the Amazon box it came in, there was just a basketball in there. It felt like we got a used basketball, even though you can clearly tell it was brand new. Just wish it wrapped like what you see in the stores, not just a ball in an amazon box
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Great for Outdoor Play
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product expecting a cheap ball to use for a couple of months but this ball was better than any others I bought. The rubber makes it easier to bounce on concrete and on dirt. They already came inflated so there is no need for a pump. The little bumps on the ball make it easier to grasp and lay it in. They also came in a variety of colors and sizes so they can work for anyone. I greatly recommend these for anyone who wants to play outside. The balls don't become deformed from the heat so they are very worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Dinesh

customer_reviews.title: 1 of 4 basketballs is flat
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 4 basketballs for our 13 y/o son. 3 of the 4 balls are holding their air properly, have to air up 1 of the balls with each use, used a few times with an automated/electronic basketball feeder. It isn't "dead flat", but it's flat...not at the subjective pressure a basketball should be, compared to previous basketballs, and compared to the 3 other basketballs received within the same shipment. Would buy again, and would recommend...cost effective...the 4 of them look pretty awesome in the Dr.Dish we purchased for his b-day, but wish that 4th ball was up to the same quality standards as the others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Usually have good luck....but not this time
customer_reviews.text: We are unable to keep the ball inflated.....I should have checked it when it came.....but waited till the Grandkids came to use it on our court.....won’t hold the air
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The reason I purchased this ball was because it’s very visually appealing. Blue and green are my son’s favorite colors and he needed a new basketball. The colors on this really are unique and make it fun. This ball doesn’t hold the air and deflated quickly. We have ordered two and both arrived partially deflated and when air is added the ball deflated quickly. We were very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball
customer_reviews.text: We got this ball for our dog, who pushes it around with her nose. The ball arrived inflated, in a regular brown box. It is nice and solid and seems to be holding its air very well. Our dog plays with the ball on dirt/rocks. Even on the dirt it has some bounce. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: J. L.

customer_reviews.title: Could not hold up to outside weather and playtime
customer_reviews.text: This ball was great at first. However, the ball leaks air. I have boys and they like to play ball. If you are going to make a ball, make it to solid and strong. We live in a warm climate and the kids play outside in the heat. The ball could not handle the hard play.
customer_reviews.author: Von

customer_reviews.title: Kids are very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this ball for our granddaughter to use outside with her backboard and hoop. We also picked up another street ball. Both she and her brothers prefer this one. It's durable, bounces well and is recognizable if she takes it anywhere! They would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: betty

customer_reviews.title: Rubber BBall
customer_reviews.text: Seems like the same quality as NBA street ball by Spalding. I like these rubber balls for my concrete drive way. I normally buy around 4 a year as my driveway eats them up. Couple months of play out of each is all to be expected so I get these aren’t gonna last forever. Good drip and like the Salmon color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: Big Billy Style

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Basketball... Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this Basketball for Easter for our 7 year old son. Great basketball. Comes already aired up, so it’s ready to use. We have purchased several basketballs throughout the years from Walmart, the last one didn’t even last a week before losing air. This basketball seems like good quality, and has been going strong since we purchased it (about a month ago). Fun colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a almost a perfect crafted basketball. It claims to be an outdoor but the black stripes have peeled a little after a bit of play. It's something only to be noticed if you really examine it but it shouldn't peel like that. Over all the quality is great, grip is firm, wheight is great. Still as good as any other basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Diego Martinez

customer_reviews.title: No air
customer_reviews.text: Will not stay inflated. We have to pump it up every 10 minutes. It's in the bucket and we're using the old one we were trying to replace.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Rickard

customer_reviews.title: Good recreational ball, not for 5 on 5
customer_reviews.text: Not an awesome basketball. Great for kids but not recommended for street ballers. Need to deflate some air when you get it. Color scheme is cool but there's just no replacing the leather balls. I've seen a few outdoor balls that are better than this. Get it for you kid that leaves it outside all the time but not for the guys trying to play ball a few times a night.
customer_reviews.author: drum_24

customer_reviews.title: It functions just like a real basketball
customer_reviews.text: It was inexpensive, looked like the picture, holds air, and fits in a standard size basket. My kids definitely prefer it for playing basketball to my basketball patterned medicine ball. Seriously, it's an inexpensive basketball designed to be played on blacktop courts (tough).
customer_reviews.author: John Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to get the kids from TV and computer games and get some real outdoor playing.
customer_reviews.text: Spalding has very nice basketballs for my boys, bought two sizes and two colors, blue and red so two can shoot, no need to wait. Colors are very accurate. Ball are always outdoors on the terrace in rain and in heat (no sun) and after a year only minor scratches from outdoor playing and still going strong. My expectation was to pump air every month but only needed three times a year to pump air with a Franklin Sports Ball Maintenance Kit and works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Gadget

customer_reviews.title: its a cheap ball.
customer_reviews.text: this ball only lasted 4 months with my 13 year old using it outside on concrete. at 4 months most grip was gone the lettering was rubbed off and the black separation lines were gone.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Super fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter seems to love her bday gift. She loves the fact it is multicolored & always chooses it when shooting a lot. She has just got into basketball. We had it for a month, the basketball is a good size for her (she is 8) & appears of good quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ready to play
customer_reviews.text: I’m no basketball expert and neither are my grandkids. But they are also not experts at putting away things used outside. So this outdoor ball is perfect. Came inflated and strong.
customer_reviews.author: Carol R. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great ball outdoors and even swimming pool. Good grip and feel. So much better that the old rubber balls many of us grew up with on the playground. This ball has greatly exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Brad C

customer_reviews.title: Durable, cheap, good.
customer_reviews.text: Great value, The grip does not wear down over time. I've been playing basketball outside every week with this one and it has held up pretty well. You may need to pump it up with air a Little bit after you play with it for a long game though.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan Nicosia

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Use
customer_reviews.text: This ball has dramatically improved my sky hook accuracy. Seriously, we were using a leather ball that just got chewed up on our concrete home court. This is so much nicer for grip and durability on an outside court. Great value too.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Loblaw

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball for my 5y
customer_reviews.text: Great basketball for my 5y.o. son who is just starting the clinic league. Not too big/not too small, well made, and the blue and black color option is nice for keeping track of yours in a sea of orange basketballs. I admit I was dismayed at first that he didn't want a traditional orange one but if he can get excited about the color, he can get more excited about playing the game, so I'm happy. Also with this color ball and a silver sharpie, the little guy enjoyed writing his name and age all over it. Many times.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel717

customer_reviews.title: Top notch seller!!
customer_reviews.text: This review is geared more towards the seller than the product. I can't say how impressed I am with the seller's determination to get the jacket to fit perfectly. The communication was fast and polite and they got the jacket to fit perfectly! This not an easy task for a guy with odd measurements. The jacket itself is nice, but perhaps not the highest quality that I was hoping for. But you get what you pay for, so I can't blame the seller as much as my budget/wallet.
customer_reviews.author: RCSousa

customer_reviews.title: Good size, great grip, different packaging than shown
customer_reviews.text: Great ball but note that it doesn't come packaged as pictured. It comes in a plain cardboard box. It didn't bother me as it was for me and not a gift, but keep it in mind when ordering. The size is perfect for me; I am a female and don't have hands big enough for a standard ball. The grip is nice on this ball. Overall happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maybe Katie

customer_reviews.title: Faulty ball
customer_reviews.text: The ball came deflated, then I tried to inflate again but the valve let the air scape.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Ayala

customer_reviews.title: I love this basketball!
customer_reviews.text: I play outdoors at a local park and seeing this blue and green transition is very pleasing to the eye. Plus the texture of the ball always gives me grip and when dribbling it doesn't slip out of my hands. It doesn't pick up dirt as much as other normal regulation balls and so far so good, thx!
customer_reviews.author: CK.

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 12 year old to go outside and play basketball with his friends. Have left it outside in all kinds of weather and it has not lost any air thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great playground ball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball for a great price if you're looking for a playground ball. My only complaint is that it took over a month to arrive, which is why it only got 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Been There Done That

customer_reviews.title: i like it because when i first got it it was ...
customer_reviews.text: i like it because when i first got it it was really bouncy and high quality but after one month of playing with it the paint or whatever it is started fading off the basketball and that was really annoying because i used to love it with the paint or whatever it is and it was delivered really early so i was` happy and the basketball was really big so i loved that but if it came with a bundle like a bundle with a basketball hoop i would be even more happy like a small one with wheels but really good basketball.
customer_reviews.author: Murali Krishna

customer_reviews.title: Balls really need to bounce!
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for! I’ve been through two of these in 10 months. My mistake buying it a second time. Goes flat and won’t hold air. I switched to Wilson brand. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: That Matt

customer_reviews.title: I think they sent us a used basketball
customer_reviews.text: The ball we received was dirty with a few scuffs and scratches. We think it was probably used. We assume it’ll still be durable enough to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Amy&Steve

customer_reviews.title: A decent basketball.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a good basketball. Got it for my 10 y/o son who suddenly expressed an interest. He is happy with it. I bought the intermediate size.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Strong and long lasting.
customer_reviews.text: it's got high durabilty. Our ball has taken a pretty good beating and still going strong. Great value for the pricr. We own two now.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball!
customer_reviews.text: This ball came out of the box, ready to bounce!! My granddaughter was so excited to receive it and did not have to wait to play with it. We loved the colors!! Lime green and pink, so bright and pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12yr old daughter who is 5ft 2 in and she loves it. Perfect weight and size for her to practice her shooting.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Great size, great grip & my boys love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Spalding, no one better. I had to get a second one because my boys fight over it. Now they are happy and no more fighting over the ball.
customer_reviews.author: JHONNY A RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: No package.
customer_reviews.text: The ball was great quality for the price and just the right colors for the little boy we bought it for. However, it did not come in a box, which makes it look weird as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Shanny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an older child and it’s perfect. Comes perfectly inflated and has a great bounce to it. Amazing value.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good Basketball for a Good Price!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 4-yr old. He's just starting to play basketball, and while this ball is a little bigger than he'd probably prefer, he can still dribble it and shoot it without much trouble. It came pretty decently inflated, too (didn't have to add any air on our own), so he was able to use it straight out of the box. We actually ended up buying a second one for our daughter, who loved the colors and wanted her own. Good, durable ball -- definitely would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: K. Pack

customer_reviews.title: Loses air.  Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Loses air between uses. Just received two weeks ago. Spaulding won’t respond to my multiple inquiries. Terrible product. Avoid
customer_reviews.author: Brad J. Bromley

customer_reviews.title: Good price, bounces nice, works great
customer_reviews.text: Haven't played in years but ended up needing to get a ball. This one works great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: grandmasterv

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors... ours is pink!
customer_reviews.text: My girls love using this basketball. Great price and the favorite of the 5 basketballs in the house... probably because it is pink. Love that we could order different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson that is 7 years old I got it because you can use it outdoors. He plays with it a lot and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kera Cornwell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as I’d hoped. The ball came aired up and ready to go!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect basketball for kids
customer_reviews.text: Love this basketball. It is very colorful and youthful. I got this basketball for my 6 yr old son. This is perfect for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Nereida L. Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Nice ball!
customer_reviews.text: Been playing in an asphalt... so like blacktop. Of course the black pavement gets in the ball but it's holding up well. It bounces great and feels good. Nice ball and cool colors.
customer_reviews.author: McMeekin

customer_reviews.title: My favorite ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball has an excellent feel and is just so satisfying to play with. love it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron S.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable ball
customer_reviews.text: What can you really say about a basketball? It's what I expected. Purchased as a gift for a niece who wanted a vibrant "fun" basketball. The ball itself was exactly what I was expecting. Unfortunately it was not received in gift giving condition. Maybe it spent a little too much time in the warehouse but it was filthy. I had to clean off scuff marks and dirt before wrapping this up. It was not a big enough problem to require returning, but buying new I did expect to get it in new condition. I'm glad it was shipped to my home and not directly to the recipient.
customer_reviews.author: courlog

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stay inflated..
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about this ball. Would be great if it would stay inflated. Had to order a replacement which I hope will be better!
customer_reviews.author: EMC

customer_reviews.title: Good quality to cost value
customer_reviews.text: Decent ball. Quality is very decent for the price. The rubber feels high quality. The colors have held up perfectly after a few weeks of using it quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Responsible citizen

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my nephew, ball is so cool-looking and fun to shoot around with.
customer_reviews.author: Al R

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality, popped immediately once we started using. Amazon was very helpful with sending a replacement but unfortunately it was the same situation with the replacement
customer_reviews.author: Rachel G

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air pressure
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it is just that I got a bad ball, but I have to inflate it every time I use it. This ball simply does not hold air pressure. Be sure to have an air pump on the ready if you get this basketball.
customer_reviews.author: DixieLambs

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect it to be flat disappointed as gift couldn’t find needle once I got it inflated loved it
customer_reviews.author: z06vette

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: This was for my 10yr old daughter. She loves the colors and quality of product, as it aligns to requirements of her basketball team.
customer_reviews.author: Yessenia Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: All Star Player One Day
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ball for my godson for Christmas. The only thing he asked for at 8 years old, WOW! I didn't realize until I went to one of his basketball games that he is an "ALL STAR" player. He wanted the ball to practice and practice he does every day after school. This ball helped him to practice his shooting skills.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Thank You Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I’m so grateful to Amazon for delivery on this basketball. It will keep my four grandchildren home and happy! To the drivers and staff through out the company: I appreciate your work to help keep me safe. Love, An Old Lady with Immunity Problems❤️
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA F KNIGHT

customer_reviews.title: great street ball
customer_reviews.text: this basket ball was pruchased for my Grandson, his goal is on a black top finish and it makes a great ball for that environment
customer_reviews.author: SHAWN R. ROELING

customer_reviews.title: 2nd time to get this as our beater outdoor ball ...
customer_reviews.text: 2nd time to get this as our beater outdoor ball. Slightly small for being "official sized" and takes several days to wear out the new ball roughness, but very playabvle.
customer_reviews.author: Simple Guy

customer_reviews.title: Goes Flat first week.  Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Do Not Buy. Went flat first week we had it. Bought it 2 months early for my daughter's birthday, so could not return. Like other reviews say, goes flat
customer_reviews.author: Etechhy

customer_reviews.title: Good Basketball
customer_reviews.text: Good Basketball. This was a gift for my son and he liked it
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK JONES

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it ..but someone stole his first one so we are reordering another ..eye catching great basketball
customer_reviews.author: Ana Bracamontes

customer_reviews.title: Cool basketball
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved this basketball. The colors make it more fun. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered four basketballs for my children to play with during COVID-19 quarantine. They all showed up flat.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Smells really bad
customer_reviews.text: When you use this, it's like you've been working in an oil platform for 24 years without wearing a pair of gloves. Doesn't keep the air pressure that long either.
customer_reviews.author: V AD

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old loves playing
customer_reviews.text: Got for my 6 year old. He loves playing basketball. And this ball is great for him.
customer_reviews.author: abbie

customer_reviews.title: Looses air
customer_reviews.text: I did realize that the 28.5 was small that was my fault. but it does loose air fast.
customer_reviews.author: Benson James

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.  So much for my Grandsons birthday gift.  Total fail.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived seriously under inflated. No air pump, however it did not come with a pump. This is not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Parrish

customer_reviews.title: It improves your "game" :)
customer_reviews.text: It's round - it holds air - it bounces and I beat my children with it all the time! Since I stink at B-ball - I have to be winning because of the ball! *LMAO*
customer_reviews.author: EAGLESOAR1

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this purchase, I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Malave

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these in different colors. So two can shoot baskets at a time. Four grandsons , no arguments of whose turn to shoot baskets. Usually only two want to play at a time unless they are actually playing a game.
customer_reviews.author: MLT

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I sent this ball to my son over summer break. He was staying with his grandparents and a neighbor kid has a basketball court but no ball. They had a blast. He used it every day while there and brought it home to play with too.
customer_reviews.author: Nakia

customer_reviews.title: Decent basketball
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son to shoot hoops on the driveway. Not much to say, it’s a decent basketball for where it is used. Also, there were a lot more color choices available through Amazon then the big box stores. My 8 year old likes it. It’s worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tom P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The ball came inflated and ready to play with. The package is just a cardboard box so you could easily gift it to someone. Great product 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Aguida

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I got this for an amazing price and my daughters favorite color is blue.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Swimming pool ball
customer_reviews.text: This ball is just perfect for my dogs to play with in the swimming pool!
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Bates

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This came and ready filled with air. Kids love it and it is a great quality Ball. Going to buy another one
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: official NBA women size seems to be a good fit for her
customer_reviews.text: It's affordable and it bounces. Bought this for my mom to shoot hoops in the driveway, official NBA women size seems to be a good fit for her.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastien Maximilien

customer_reviews.title: You've Got Balls
customer_reviews.text: Great for my kids. They go through at least 3 per year. So far this is holding up and may make it to next year. Only time will tell. Plus this ball looks cool!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Taz Kuzara

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: This is a great basketball and the color is nice however it does fade in the sun so put it away daily if you want it to last.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi

customer_reviews.title: Wears down FAST
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had this ball for just over a month, and it’s already worn down completely. There is no “texture” to the ball anymore. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Ball itself-good. Color-not so much.
customer_reviews.text: The ball itself and the durability is good, good grip, etc. But the main thing is that the picture is deceiving. It shows black and white. But it is actually black and bright turquoise. Just an FYI before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Good Baseketball
customer_reviews.text: Basketball is used almost daily by a 6 year old boy and has held up on concrete for about 2 months now. Would purchase again. ***Update***05Sept2015--The basketball has lasted for almost 2 years now and most of the tread is worn off. During basketball season the ball is used daily on a concrete driveway. My son loves this ball. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Riptide

customer_reviews.title: It is what it SAYS it is.....
customer_reviews.text: Granted the pic looks like leather but it clearly says in the description that it's rubber, and if you look closely on the ball it says 'durable outdoor cover'. This is for my 12 year old who has lost more basketballs than you can shake a stick at so I'm thrilled with it. I don't know what the bit is with the zoom turning the pic into another ball entirely, but the pic of this ball w/out zoom is pretty dead on except for it looking like leather. (I took the one star off because of that, though.)
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY, INEXPENSIVE BASKETBALL
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter ball for kids that are just starting basketball. My kids were able to grip this ball really well. The ball holds its shape and air great too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great basketball!
customer_reviews.text: All around a great looking and feeling ball. Kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SECOND ONE DEFLATED
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one for my son black and it was deflated, sent it back the next day the 2nd one was deflated. I'm so over Amazon right now, will return this one again if I can locate the shipping label? If not still returning.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for light use
customer_reviews.text: Fun to use but over time it wears more than I thought but would.
customer_reviews.author: Wewilly

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Will buy this product again when in need! Met expectations and then some.
customer_reviews.author: amtaylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Item/Basketball !
customer_reviews.text: Amazon Rocks! Just the best from the best! Buy this one with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Monty

product_meta.title: Spalding NBA Varsity Multi Color Outdoor Basketball
product_meta.description: Take your game to new heights with the Spalding® NBA® Varsity neon basketball. It's designed with a premium rubber cover for durability, and its official size and weight make it perfect for outdoor play.
feature_bullets: Intermediate size and weight: Size 6, 28.5 inches
